events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund immediately.
The issue has been classified under the refund cluster based on customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello, I am Sarah, and I will help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I please get the order number and details about the item received?
My order number is 123456789, and instead of the headphones I ordered, I got a set of cables.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label.
Thanks for handling this quickly, I appreciate the prompt refund arrangement and will send back the incorrect item soon.
The refund has been processed and the return shipment label emailed to you; the issue is now resolved.
We are following up to ensure you have returned the item and received your refund without any issues.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further issues reported, we are closing the case now.
